name: Bomb On A Rope!
description: An evil demolition man has wreaked havoc on your construction site and you must stop him by sending a bomb up a rope to the top of the site, where the bomb man is attacking you with bombs that can blast your head off! Be quick! Each level the bomb that you must send has a different time that will detonate and once it does you are done for! Mastering a level within a few tries can grant you a medal to keep the replay value high and if that's not enough, the game comes with a built-in level editor, complete with instructions,  so that you can get creative!
